name: hexabot-helper-gemini
description: The Gemini Helper Extension for Hexabot Chatbot / Agent Builder to enable the LLM RAG Capability

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release:common
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release:common
scripts.release: echo 'Please specify patch or minor: npm run release:patch or npm run release:minor'

author: Hexastack
